nodes.text: Braxx, also known as Braxx the Bloodhound was a male Human Mandalorian present during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. As a member of Clan Varad, he participated in the Battle for the Allusis. Using his skills as a beast master, he fought off the strike team sent to capture the hijacked ship with two of his trained salky hounds only to be defeated and killed.
